content.body: FWIW, W3C has this self-assessment security&privacy questionnaire that is super useful to get an understanding of new specifications. https://www.w3.org/TR/security-privacy-questionnaire/
and here's an example to see how I filled it out for the Sanitizer API https://github.com/WICG/sanitizer-api/blob/main/security-questionnaire.md
Thank you so much for sharing, freddy! I can't wait to check it out.
content.formatted_body: Thank you so much for sharing, freddy! I can't wait to check it out.
